home.bullet_trusted_by_millions: Miljoonien käyttäjien luottama, vapaan lähdekoodin lompakko
home.confirm_email: Sinun pitää vahvistaa se käyttääksesi lompakkoasi
home.any_mobile_device: Web-käyttöliittymälle tukee kaikkia suosituimpia mobiililaitteita kuten Androidia, iPhonea ja iPada. Voit siis hallita lompakkoasi virtuaalisesti mistä tahansa.
home.backup: Mutta mikäli kadotat puhelimesi tai se varastetaan, lompakkosi on edelleen turvassa palvelimellamme.
home.encryption: Blockchain käyttää teollisuusstandardi AES-salausta suojatakseen lompakkoasi varkailta ja krakkereilta.
home.in_browser: Mahtava juttu on se, että kaikki tehdään selaimessasi ennen kuin se lähetetään servereillemme, joten edes me emme pääse sinun lompakkoosi!
home.more_about_safety: Lue lisää kuinka varmistamme tietoturvan sinulle
home.most_advanced: Blockchain ei 100 % ilmainen kaikkien kulujen osalta. Se on myös kaikista kehittynein online-lompakko kaikkilla rakastamillanne toiminnoilla, kuten:
home.usage: My Walletin käyttäminen ei eroa PayPalista tai verkkopankista. Kirjautuessasi näet saldosi sekä viimeaikaiset tapahtumat.
home.also_available: Muista, että Blockchain on myös saatavilla:
home.find_more: Lue lisää kuinka takaamme tietoturvan sinulle
home.full_control: Blockchain-lompakollasi, saat täyden vallan yksityisavaimeesi, jolloin lompakkoasi ei voida koskaan jäädyttää tai sulkea ja voit siirtää lompakon myös muihin bitcoin-ohjelmiin
home.how_it_works: Haluaisitko kenties tietää hieman enemmän? Lue kuinka se toimii.
home.merchants: Yli 1000 kauppiasta hyväksyy jo bitcoinit maailmanlaajuisesti joka päivä aloittavien lisäksi. Kaikki nettipokerista orgaaniseen kahviin, sinä päätät ja valitset, voit maksaa sen bitcoineilla.
home.official_wiki: Näe koko lista bitcoinit hyväksyvistä kauppiaista virallisessa wikissä.
home.direct_deposit: Oletko innokas? Hienoa, koska voit sijoittaa bitcoineihin tilisiirrolla, käteisellä ja puhelimitse Blockchain-lompakkoosi sekunneissa.
home.available_countries: Saatavilla Yhdysvalloissa, Yhdistyneessä kuningaskunnassa ja 100 muussa maassa
home.open_free_safe: Blockchain on vapaata lähdekoodia, ilmainen, turvallinen ja hauska käyttää.

charts.market_price2: Kaavio joka näyttää USD:n hinnan Mt.gox-pörssistä
charts.market_cap2: Kaavio joka näyttää bitcoinien kokonaismäärän levikissä * Vaihtokurssi USD:na.
charts.n_unique_addresses2: Kaavio, joka näyttää uniikkien bitcoin-osoitteiden määrän päivää kohden.
charts.my_wallet_n_tx: My Wallet'n tapahtumien määrä päivää kohden
charts.my_wallet_network_percent: Percentage of Bitcoin Transactions Originating from Blockchain
charts.trade_vol2: A chart showing the USD trade volume from the top exchanges.
charts.n_transactions_excluding_popular2: A chart showing the total number of unique bitcoin transactions per day excluding those which involve any of the top 100 most popular addresses
charts.my_wallet_n_users2: Number of wallets hosts using our My Wallet Service.
charts.days_destroyed_filter_week2: Filtered by minimum input age of 1 week.
charts.my_wallet_transaction_volume2: 24hr Transaction Volume of our web wallet service.
charts.operating_margin2: The graph showing miners revenue minus estimated electricity and bandwidth costs.
charts.mywallet_n_transactions_per_day: My Wallet: Number of transactions per day
charts.blockchain_size2: The total size of all block headers and transactions. Not including database indexes.
charts.avg_block_size2: The Average block size in MB
charts.transaction_fees2: A charts showing the total BTC value of transaction fees miners earn per day.
charts.hash_rate2: The estimated number of giga hashes per second (billions of hashes per second) the bitcoin network is performing.
charts.days_destroyed_filter_year2: Filtered by minimum input age of 1 year.
charts.title: Bitcoin Charts - Blockchain.info
charts.my_wallet_n_tx2: Number of transactions made by My Wallet Users per day.
charts.n_transactions2: A chart of the total number of unique bitcoin transactions per day.
charts.total_receive_per_day: Total BTC Received per day to:
charts.network_deficit2: Shows difference between transaction fees and cost of bitcoin mining.
charts.days_destroyed_filter_week: Bitcoin Days Destroyed (Filtered By Min Age 1 Week)
charts.n_transactions_per_block2: A chart of the average number of transactions per block.
charts.n_transactions_excluding_popular: Number of transactions excluding popular addresses
charts.days_destroyed2: A none cumulative version of Bitcoin Days Destroyed.
charts.estimated_transaction_volume2: Similar to the total output volume with the addition of an algorithm which attempts to remove change from the total value. This may be a more accurate reflection of the true transaction volume.
charts.days_destroyed_filter_month: Bitcoin Days Destroyed (Filtered By Min Age 1 Month)
charts.cost_per_transaction2: A chart showing miners revenue divided by the number of transactions.
charts.days_destroyed_filter_month2: Filtered by minimum input age of 1 month.
charts.n_unique_addresses: Number Of Unique Bitcoin Addresses Used
charts.avg_confirmation_time2: The Average time take for transactions to be accepted into a block.
charts.mywallet_total_Received_per_day: My Wallet: Total Received per day to:
charts.estimated_transaction_volume_usd2: The Estimated Transaction Volume in USD value.
charts.n_transactions_per_day_to: No. of transactions per day to:
charts.cost_percent_per_transaction2: A chart showing miners revenue as as percentage of the transaction volume.
charts.output_volume2: The total value of all transaction outputs per day. This includes coins which were returned to the sender as change.
charts.total_bitcoins2: A graph showing the historical total number of bitcoins which have been mined.
charts.sub_header: Various bitcoin charts and currency statistics
charts.days_destroyed_filter_year: Bitcoin Days Destroyed (Filtered By Min Age 1 Year)
charts.meta_description: The most popular charts and statistics about the bitcoin network. Number of transactions Per Day, Market Price, Volume charts etc.
charts.miners_revenue2: Historical chart showing (number of bitcoins mined per day + transaction fees) * market price.
charts.n_orphaned_blocks2: Number of blocks mined per day not part of the main chain.
charts.days_destroyed_cumulative2: Bitcoin Days Destroyed is a measure of the transaction volume of Bitcoin. If someone has 100 BTC that they received a week ago and they spend it then 700 bitcoin days have been destroyed. If they take those 100BTC and send them to several addresses and then spend them then although the total transaction volume could be arbitrarily large the number of bitcoin days destroyed is still 700.
charts.tx_trade_ratio: Trade Volume vs Transaction Volume Ratio
charts.tx_trade_ratio2: Chart showing the relationship between BTC transaction volume and USD exchange volume.
charts.difficulty2: A chart showing difficulty changes over time. Difficulty is a measure of how difficult it is to find a new block compared to the easiest it can ever be.

other_links.strange2: Transactions which we were unable to decode the output address
other_links.hub_nodes2: A list of the most well connected bitcoin super nodes
other_links.most_popular2: Osoitteet jotka ovat vastaanottaneet eniten maksuja
other_links.nodes2: Loki kaikista bitcoin-solmuista, joihin blockchain.info on yhdistetty
other_links.rejected2: Blocks and transactions which have been rejected by our nodes
other_links.globe2: WebGL globe showing bitcoin nodes (Requires Chrome, Safari)
other_links.double_spends2: Double spends detected in the last 500,000 transactions
other_links.orphaned2: Valid blocks not part of the main bitcoin chain
other_links.pools2: Pie chart showing the market share of the top bitcoin mining pools
other_links.notifications2: Vastaanota ilmaisia sähköposti-ilmoituksia, kun bitcoin-osoitteissasi on tapahtumia

home.search_explain: Voit antaa blokin pituuden, bitcoin-osoitteen, tapahtuman hashin, hash160, tai ipv4-osoitteen..
home.title: Bitcoin Block Explorer - Blockchain.info
home.meta_description: Bitcoin blokkien selaus & valuuttatilastot. Näytä kaikkien bitcoin-tapahtumien ja blokkien tarkat tiedot.

about.p2: Tämä sivusto mahdollistaa selata bitcoinin blokkiketjuja (tietokantoja, jotka sisältävät kaiken tiedon maksutapahtumista). Me myös ylläpidämme bitcoinin suurinta ja turvallisinta lompakko-palvelua.
about.p1: Bitcoin on vertaisverkkoon perustuva valuutta. Se tarkoittaa sitä, että keskittyä tahoa ei ole myöntämässä ja seuraamassa tehtyjä rahasiirtoja. Nämä toimet tehdään yhdessä muiden bitcoin-käyttäjien kanssa.

misc.disclaimer: Sanalla "raha" tarkoitetaan tällä sivustolla ainoastaan virtuaalista valuuttaa. Emme ota takuuta, että bitcoinit voidaan lunastaa ostohinnalla.

stats.title: Bitcoin Tilastot - Blockchain.info
stats.meta_description: Yli 100 erilaista markkina- ja verkkotilastoa. Solmujen määrä, tapahtumien volyymi, louhimisen vaikeusaste ja paljon muuta.
stats.period: All statistics are for the previous 24 hour period unless otherwise stated
stats.notice1: Electricity consumption is estimated based on power consumption of 650 Watts per gigahash and electricity price of 15 cent per kilowatt hour. In reality some miners will be more or less efficient.
stats.notice2: For profit margin hardware costs are estimated to be $1000 per gigahash every 2 years, and bandwidth $1 per gigahash per year.

wallet.new_users_p1: Uuden bitcoin-lompakon luominen vie kirjaimellisesti vain muutama sekuntia. Pystyt lähettämään ja vastaanottamaan maksuja välittömästi.
wallet.existing_users_p1: Jos olet jo luonut My Wallet -tilin, klikkaa nappia alla kirjautuaksesi.
wallet.help_p1: Käänny UKK:n puoleen usein kysyttyjen kysymyksien kohdalla. Jos sivustolla on jotain ongelmia, ota meihin yhteyttä.

transaction_page.title: Bitcoin-tapahtuma {0}

double_spend.p2: Sinun pitää olla erittäin varovainen luottaessasi tapahtumiin tälle/tältä lähettäjältä.

transaction_page.relayed_by_ip_warning: Näytetty IP-osoite yksilöi bitcoin-solmun, joka lähetti tapahtuman ensimmäisenä blockchain.info -sivustolle ensimmäisenä. Se ei välttämättä ole tapahtuman IP-osoite.
transaction_page.conflicting_transaction_redirect: The transaction hash you searched for was not found. However a replacement for the transaction is listed below.
transaction_page.conflicting_transaction_found: A conflicting transaction has been detected in our memory pool. The transaction hash displayed below may change.

unspent_outputs.title: Unspent Outputs {0}
unspent_outputs.meta_description: A list of all unspent bitcoin outputs belonging to {0}.
unspent_outputs.locked_outputs_desc: Locked outputs are outputs which have been marked temporarily unspendable by blockchain.info. This is usually because a transaction spending one of these outputs has just been broadcast. Locked inputs automatically unlock after approximately 10 minutes.

address.title: Bitcoin-osoite {0}
address.meta_description: Transactions sent and received from bitcoin address {0}.
address.sub_header: Addresses are identifiers which you use to send bitcoins to another person.
address.double_spend_warning: Warning! this bitcoin address contains transactions which may be double spends. You should be extremely careful when trusting any transactions to or from this address.
address.address_possibly_inaccurate: Warning! The results shown may be inaccurate. This is usually becuase an address contains a very large number of unconfirmed transactions.
address.no_transactions: No transactions found for this address, it has probably not been used on the network yet.
address.too_large_to_filter: This Address ledger is too large to filter
address.invalid_address: Valitettavasti tämä ei ole oikeaoppinen bitcoin-osoite
address.invalid_hash_160: Valitettavasti tämä ei ole oikeaoppinen hash 160

wallet_index.title: Bitcoin Wallet
wallet_index.meta_description: My Wallet is a free online bitcoin wallet which you can use to make worldwide payments for free. We make paying with bitcoins easy and secure.
wallet_index.p1: My Wallet on ilmainen verkossa toimiva bitcoin-lompakko, jota voidaan käyttää wallet which you can use to make worldwide payments for free. We make paying with bitcoins easy and secure available anywhere on your phone or desktop.
wallet_index.p2: Me emme ole pankki; sinulla on täysi omistusoikeus rahaasi. Emme näe lompakkosi saldoa, tapahtumia tai tehdä maksuja sinun puolestasi.
wallet_index.techradar_quote: By 2015, cash could be looking like an endangered species

slides.mobile_support_p1: Web-käyttöliittymämme tukee kaikkia suosittuja mobiililaitteita kuten mm.
slides.mobile_support_p2: Jos kadotat puhelimesi tai se varastetaan, lompakkosi on edelleen turvallisesti varmuuskopioitu servereillemme.
slides.double_encryption_p1: Ennen kuin bitcoin-lompakkosi on tallennettu serverillemme, se kryptataan 256-bittisellä AES-algoritmilla selaimessasi. Salasanaasi ei koskaan lähetetä palvelimillemme, joten edes me emme voi avata lompakkoasi. Eikä siinä vielä kaikki, sillä voit halutessasi määrittää lompakkosi kryptattavaksi kaksinkertaisesti, jolloin vaadimme ensimmäistä kirjautumiseen ja toista maksujen tekemiseen. Jos se ei riitä, tarjoamme sinulle myös mahdollisuuden 2-vaiheista kirjautumiseen esim. Yubikeyllä tai Google Authenticatorilla.
slides.one_click_backups_p1: Me teemme kaikkemme pitääksesi lompakkosi turvallisesti varmuuskopioituna. Siitä huolimatta omalle koneelle tallennettua varmuuskopiota ei voi koskaan korvata. Napin klikkauksella, saat kryptatun lompakkosi sähköpostitse lähetettynä, tallennettuna Dropboxiin tai omalle koneellesi. Näin ollen jos blockchain.info kärsii tietojen häviämisestä tai kaatuu, sinulla on edelleen täydet oikeudet rahoihisi.
slides.payment_notifications_p1: Vastaanota ilmoituksia kun maksuja lähetetään tai vastaanotetaan bitcoin-lompakkoosi. Keskimääräinen viive ilmoituksella on 0,05 sekuntia. Jos vastaanotat maksun ollessasi sisäänkirjautunut My Wallet'n ilmoitamme sinulle äänimerkillä, jonka lisäksi päivitämme tilisi saldon ilman sivun uudelleen lataamista.
slides.charts_analytics_p1: Luo kaavioita ja raportteja viimeisimmistä bitcoin-tapahtumista. Näet mm. tilisi saldon, tapahtumien määrän sekä tulot ja menot aikajanalla.

security.title: Turvallinen
security.p2: -kryptausta suojataksesi lompakkosi varkailta ja krakkereilta. Mahtava juttu on se, että kaikki tehdään selaimessasi ennen kuin se lähetetään servereillemme, joten edes me emme pääse sinun lompakkoosi!
security.p3: My Wallet tarjoaa sinulle kaikki bitcoinin turvallisuustyökalut kuten

easy.title: Helppo käyttää
easy.p2: ista tai verkkopankista. Kirjautuessasi näytämme sinulle tilisi saldon ja viimeisimmät tapahtumat

control.title: Säilytä valtasi
control.p1: Bitcoinin hienous on siinä, että se on täysin keskittämätön: hallitusta tai yritys ei voi estää maksuja tai sulkea tilejä.
control.p2: My Wallet takaa sinulle täyden vallan
control.p4: , joka tarkoittaa että lompakkoja ei voi koskaan jäädyttää tai sulkea ja ne voidaan helposti siirtää toiseen sovellukseen.

deposit.title: Välittömät sijoitukset
deposit.p1: Siirrä tilisiirrolla, käteisellä tai monella muulla tavalla bitcoineija My Wallet -tilillesi sekunneissa. Saatavilla Yhdysvalloissa, Yhdistyneessä kuningaskunnassa ja 100 muussa maassa maailmanlaajuisesti.

merchants.title: Maailmanlaajuiset kauppiaat
merchants.p1: Yli 1000 kauppiasta hyväksyy jo bitcoinit maailmanlaajuisesti joka päivä aloittavien lisäksi. Kaikki nettipokerista orgaaniseen kahviin, sinä päätät ja valitset, voit maksaa sen bitcoineilla.
merchants.p2: Täysi lista bitcoinit hyväksyvistä kauppiasta löydät

tooltips.aes: Erittäin vahva kryptausstandardi, jota mm. Yhdysvaltain hallitus käyttää. AES on tuttu myös VPN:stä ja monista kommunikointiprotokollista.
tooltips.paper_wallet: Paperilompakko on tulostettava asiakirja, joka sisältää kaiken tarvittavan lompakkosi palauttamiseen.
tooltips.remote_backup: Etä-varmuuskopiot ovat muualle kuin omalle koneelle tehtyjä varmuuskopioita. Tämä on tärkeää tehdä tietokoneen kiintolevyn hajoamisen tai muun tietokoneen virheellisen toiminnan varalta.
tooltips.offline_transactions: Offline transactions are bitcoin transactions which are generated without an active internet connection. They are considered more secure as your PC is isolated from the internet.
tooltips.paypal: PayPal on käytöstä pois jäämässä maksunvälittäjä
tooltips.private_key: Bitcoin addresses consist of two parts. The private key is the part which is used to prove ownership of an address and is need to withdraw funds. It should be kept safe at all times.

wallet_new.title: My Wallet
wallet_new.sub_header1: Ole hyvä ja valitse alias ja salasana lompakollesi.
wallet_new.wallet_created_p1: Uusi online-lompakkosi on nyt onnistuneesti luotu. On tärkeää pitää lompakkosi tunniste ja salasana tallessa. Voimme palauttaa ainoastaan tunnisteen oikeaa sähköpostiosoitetta vastaan. Emme voi auttaa hukkuneiden salasanojen kanssa!
wallet_new.restore_link_title: Voit palauttaa tämän lompakon koska tahansa vierailemalla:
wallet_new.fav_recommendation: On suositeltavaa lisätä tämä sivu kirjanmerkkeihisi!
wallet_new.alias_sub: Voit valita aliaksen lompakollesi, jota voit käyttää kirjautumiseen tunnisteen sijasta.
wallet_new.alias_help_block: Alias tai lyhytosoite, joka auttaa lompakon löytämisen.
wallet_new.dont_forget_password_p1: VAROITUS: Unohtuneet salasanat ovat PALAUTTAMATTOMISSA ja aiheuttavat KAIKKIEN BITCOINIEN HÄVIÄMISEN.
wallet_new.password_strength_p1: Me edellytämme salasanan pituuden olevan vähintään 10 merkkiä, joten myös tilanteessa jossa tietokantamme vaarantuu, lompakkosi pysyy tallessa. 10 merkkiä pitkän salasanan arvaaminen vie yli 1000 vuotta.
wallet_new.existing_account: Jos sinulla on jo My Wallet -tili {0}
wallet_new.mnemonic_modal_p1: Lompakkosi on onnistuneesti luotu. Jos satut unohtamaan tietosi, kaikki voidaan palauttaa seuraavalla muistilorulla:
wallet_new.mnemonic_modal_save_warning: Ole hyvä ja älä tallenna muistilorua tietokoneellesi tai tallenna sitä sähköpostiisi. Kirjoita käsin tai tulosta se!
wallet_new.mnemonic_modal_p2: Ilman muistilorua emme voi palauttaa tiliä, jonka tiedot ovat unohtuneet. Tämä tarkoittaa KAIKKIEN BITCOINIESI HÄVIÄMISTÄ.

wallet_forgot_identifier.title: Unohditko tunnisteen?
wallet_forgot_identifier.sub_header: Anna sähköpostiosoitteesi tai puhelinnumerosi, jotta voimme lähettää sinulle palautuslinkin.
wallet_forgot_identifier.p1: Jos et ole liittänyt sähköpostia, ota meihin yhteyttä ({0}) tarjoten Skype-, Google Talk -tunnustasi tai mitä tahansa, jolla voimme todentaa sinut.

balance.title: Oma saldo
balance.tip: Tämä on bitcoin-tilisi saldo. Et voi ehkä käyttää tätä kokonaan ennen kuin kaikki bitcoin-tapahtumasi on vahvistettu.

connection_status.title: Yhdistämisen tila
connection_status.tip: Jos katkaiset yhteyden, sinun tulee ladata sivu uudelleen nähdäksesi saldosi ja uudet tapahtumat. Kun olet yhdistetty, näet uudet tapahtumat välittömästi.

account_settings.title: Tilin asetukset

pbkdf2_iterations.p1: PBKDF2 is a function which stretches your password increasing the effort required to bruteforce it. A higher number of iterations is better however you may notice a slow down of your browser.
pbkdf2_iterations.p2: Changing this value can cause compatability issues between old clients which don't support the new wallet encryption format.

account_settings.logging_deletion: Lokin tason muuttaminen ei vaikuta nykyisiin lokeihin. Lokit vanhenevat 2 viikon kuluttua.
account_settings.logging_disabled: Lokit pois käytöstä. Toimintoja ei kirjata lokiin.
account_settings.logging_level_description: The logging level controls what data is recorded when actions are taken using your wallet. By default the logging is turned off apart from actions taken by admins. Enabling it provides better security by providing more information on potential unauthorized access to your wallet however some privacy may be sacrificed.
account_settings.email_verification_description: Sähköpostiosoite tarvitaan hävinneiden tunnisteiden palauttamiseen sekä maksuilmoituksiin
account_settings.alias_description: Alias on lyhytosoite, jolla pääset lompakkoosi ilman, että sinun pitää muista tunnistettasi
account_settings.alias_placeholder: Nimimerkki tai muu helposti muistettava sana
account_settings.mobile_number_description: Anna puhelinnumerosi alle. Maailmanlaajuiset tekstiviestit ovat joskus epäluotettavia ja eivät välttämättä ole saatavissa joissakin maissa tai operaattoreilla.
account_settings.automatic_email_backups_description: Valitse tämä vastaanottaaksesi varmuuskopion aina kun lompakkosi päivittyy
account_settings.local_currency_description: Voit nopeasti vaihtaa bitcoinien ja paikallisen valuutan välillä klikkaamalla lompakkosi saldoa oikeassa yläreunassa
account_settings.uri_handler_description: Haluatko käyttää blockchain.infoa oletuskäsittelijänä bitcoin-linkeille? Bitcoin-linkkejä (URI) käytetään asettamaan vastaanottaja sekä summa automaattisesti.
account_settings.btc_currency_description: Määritä tarkkuus, jossa mieluiten bitcoin-arvot haluat nähdä.
account_settings.transactions_per_page_description: Määritä kuinka monta tapahtumaa haluat nähdä yhdellä sivulla.
account_settings.inactivity_logout_description: Oletuksena sinut kirjataan automaattisesti ulos kun olet ollut toimettomana 10 minuuttia. Voit säätää arvoa alla.
account_settings.fee_policy_description: Blockchain.info -siirrot ovat ilmaisia. Joka tapauksessa bitcoin-verkko voi vaatia ylimääräisen louhijoiden palkkion, jonka määrä vaikuttaa vahvistuksien saamisen nopeuteen sekä auttaa tukemaan verkkoa. Voit muuttaa oletuskäytäntöä alla.
account_settings.fee_policy_low_description: Louhintapalkkiota ei sisällytetä, paitsi mikäli toisin vaaditaan
account_settings.fee_policy_high_description: Kulut asetetaan siten, että siirrot saavat korkean prioriteetin. (0.001 BTC pohjakulut).
account_settings.integrity_check_description: Checks all keys in your wallet match the correct bitcoin address and re-encrypts your wallet. This may take a long time in some browsers.
account_settings.check_compressed_description: Checks the balance of both compressed and uncompressed versions of all private keys to verify there is no transactions which can be redeemed not shown in the main wallet balance.
account_settings.notifications_description: Saa halutessasi ilmoitus aina kun lähetät tai vastaanotat maksuja lompakkoosi
account_settings.email_notifications_description: Saat ilmoitukset sähköpostitse. Ole hyvä ja vahvista sähköpostisi jos et ole vielä niin tehnyt.
account_settings.skype_description: Vastaanotat ilmoitukset Skypen kautta seuraavalle nimimerkille:
account_settings.http_notifications_p1: Http Notifications will be sent when transactions are sent or received. Please see developers section for a guide to implementing the callback.
account_settings.html5_notifications_p1: HTML 5 Notifications are different from regular pop-ups in that they require the user's permission to be shown. Currently supported in Chrome & Safari.
account_settings.device_pairing_description: Skannaa koodi iPhonellasi tai Androidillasi liittääksesi sen tiliisi
account_settings.forgot_password_warning_p2: Unohdetut salasanat tekevät lompakkosi käytettävättömäksi. Salasanan palautusta ei ole olemassa!
account_settings.password_notice: Salasanojasi ei koskaan eikä missään muodossa lähetätä palvelimillemme. Tämä tarkoittaa että lompakkosi on tallessa vaikka serverimme tila vaarantuisi. Koska emme tiedä salasanaasi, meillä ei ole myöskään salasanan palautusta!
account_settings.password_mnemonic_description: Muistilorua käytetään palauttamaan lompakko mikäli salasana unohtuu. Ilman muistilorua ei ole olemassa mitään keinoa palauttaa lompakkoa, jonka salasana on unohtunut. Lompakon salasanaa vaihdettaessa myöskin muistiloru muuttuu.
account_settings.second_password_description: Voit vaihtoehtoisesti asettaa toissijaisen salasanan, jota vaaditaan kun yrität lähettää rahaa My Wallet -tililtäsi. Suuria lompakkoja käsitellessä, selaimesi saattaa "jäätyä" muutamaksi sekunniksi asetusta vaihdettaessa.
account_settings.double_encryption_enabled: Kaksinkertainen kryptaus on käytössä. Toissijainen salasana vaaditaan kun yrität lähettää rahaa My Wallet -tililtäsi.
account_settings.password_hints_description: Jos unohdat salasanasi, salasanavihjeet voivat auttaa sinua virkistämään muistisi. Jos olet liittänyt sähköpostiosoitteesi tiliisi, lähetämme salasanavihjeen sinulle sähköpostitse. Jos sähköpostiosoitetta ei ole liitetty, salasanavihjeet ovat kenen tahansa joka tietää lompakkosi tunnisteen nähtävissä.
account_settings.example_password: Jos lompakkosi salasana on "KissaKoiraHevonen" hyvä salasanavihje voisi olla "Kolme lempieläintäsi".
account_settings.two_factor_authentication_description: 2-vaiheinen tunnistautuminen lisää yhden kerroksen lisää turvallisuutta salasanojen jälkeen.
account_settings.yubikey_description: Liittääksesi avaimesi tilisi kanssa, valitse tekstikenttä alla ja paina vihreää nappia YubiKey -laitteessasi.
account_settings.google_authenticator_description: Avaa Google Authenticator -sovellus ja skannaa allaoleva QR-koodi suorittaaksesi liitosprosessin.
account_settings.google_authenticator_warning: Voit joutua lukituksi tililtäsi jos poistut tältä sivulta ilman liittämistä tai mikäli lopetat Google Authenticatorin käytön poistamatta sitä täällä.
account_settings.google_authenticator_p2: Kun olet skannannut QR-koodin, anna Authenticatorin luoma koodi tähän:
account_settings.secret_phrase_description: Salainen lause on tapa varmistaa henkilöllisyytesi tilanteessa, jossa hukkaat Google Authenticator -sovelluksen luoman koodin tai Yubikey-laitteesi. Salainen lause voi olla yksittäinen sana tai useammasta sanasta koostuva lause, kunhan salaisen lauseen pituus ei ylitä 255 merkkiä.
account_settings.always_keep_local_backup_description: Enable this option to force a wallet backup to be stored in your browsers local storage even when two factor authentication is enabled. If enabled an attacker with access to your browser would be able to circumvent two factor authentication, however if the wallet is accessed using any other PC or browser it is still protected by two factor authentication.
account_settings.never_remember_two_factor_description: By Default after logging in with two factor authentication your browser will be remembered for a short period of time allowing you to login again without having to re-authenticate. Check the box below if you want to disable this behaviour and require full authentication every time.
account_settings.my_wallet_verifier_description: If you are concerned about security we highly recommend you install the {0} browser extension. The My Wallet verifier can help protect against server side hacking, malicious javascript and phishing attacks.
account_settings.restrict_to_ip_description: Ota tämä käyttöön rajoittaaksesi käytön ainoastaan määrittelemillesi laitteille. Anna IP-osoitteet pilkuin eroteltuina. Käytä tätä ainoastaan mikäli sinulla on staattinen IP-osoite. Myöskään kehittäjärajapintaa ei voi käyttää muista kuin asettamistasi osoitteista, mutta mobiilisovelluksemme jatkavat toimintaansa normaalisti.
account_settings.block_tor_ips_description: Ota tämä käyttöön mikäli haluat estää anonyymin TOR-verkon IP-osoitteet.
account_settings.multiple_ip_comma_seperated: Mikäli osoitteita on useampi, erottele ne pilkuin
account_settings.security_warning_sub: Tilin asetukset näyttää arkaluonteisia tietoja, joita ei sovi näyttää muille ihmisille. On suositeltavaa ettet avaa tätä osiota julkisilla paikoilla tai ota kuvakaappauksia osiolla ollessasi.
account_settings.android_notifications_p1: Vastaanotat ilmoituksia Android-puhelimeesi tämän ollessa valittu

wallet_home.share_with_anyone: Jaa se kenen tahansa kanssa vastaanottaaksesi maksuja
wallet_home.deposit_description: Nopein ja helpoin tapa siirtää rahaa My Wallet -tilillesi on:
wallet_home.withdraw_description: Käytä seuraavia palveluita muuntaaksesi bitcoineja takaisin paikalliseen valuuttaasi:
wallet_home.account_settings_description: Muokkaa tilisi asetuksia, kuten sähköpostiosoitetta, salasanaa ja ilmoitusasetuksia.
wallet_home.backup_description: Lompakon varmuuskopiointi on tärkeä toimenpide jonka valitettavan usein unohtaa. Blockchain.info tekee kaikkensa varmistaakseen lompakkosi olevan tallessa, mutta on hyvä pitää kopiota myös omalla koneella aina varalla ...

receive_money.new_address_tooltip: Klikkaa tänne luodaksesi uuden bitcoin-osoitteen. Voit alkaa vastaanottamaan bitcoineja tähän osoitteeseen välittömästi.
receive_money.archived_addresses_description: Arkistoidut osoitteet ovat osoitteita, joita et enää tarvitse. Nämä osoitteet ovat edelleen kuitenkin osa lompakkoasi, mutta eivät näy päänäkymässä. Voit koska tahansa palauttaa osoitteen päänäkymään klikkaamalla sinistä kuvaketta.
receive_money.sweep_keys_tooltip: Move any bitcoins in the selected keys to a different bitcoin address.
receive_money.shared_addresses_description: Shared addresses are designed to receive payment you wish to keep private. Any payments received are sent through a shared wallet breaking the chain of transactions.
receive_money.shared_addresses_description2: Jaetut osoitteet ovat voimassa ainoastaan yhden siirron verran ja niissä on 0,5 % kulut.

login.please_enter_login_details: Ole hyvä ja anna kirjautumistietosi alle:
login.google_authenticator_help: Avaa Google Authenticator -sovellus ja syötä annettu koodi.
login.yubikey_help: Valitse tekstilaatikko yllä ja paina Yubikeyn vihreää nappia
login.email_code_help: Sähköposti joka sisältää väliaikaisen vahvistuskoodin on lähetetty.
login.sms_code_help: A text message has been sent to your cell phone. Please enter the code in that message above.
login.password_unrecoverable_warning: Salasanaasi ei koskaan lähetetä palvelimillemme ja näin ollen voida palauttaa jos unohtuu!
login.resend_link_p1: Tarkista roskapostikansiosi. Jos et silti löydä viestiä, napsauta oheista nappia lähettääksesi vahvistusviestin uudelleen.
login.resend_sms_link_p1: Tarkista verkkosi signaali. Joskus viestit voivat viedä jopa 10 minuuttia toimittaa. Jos viestisi ei ole saapunut vielä 10 minuutin jälkeenkään, napsauta oheista nappia lähettääksesi vahvistusviestin uudelleen.
login.lost_identifier_p1: Jos olet kadottanut lompakkosi tunnisteen, tarkista ensimmäisenä sähköposti jonka vastaanotit rekisteröityessäsi. Etkö löydä viestiä? Napsauta oheista nappia ja lähetämme tunnisteen sinulle uudelleen sähköpostitse.
login.lost_two_factor_p1: Jos olet kadottanut 2-vaiheiseen tunnistautumiseen vaadittavat tiedot, lompakkosi on silti täysin palautettavissasi. Tarvitsemme ainoastaan henkilökohtaisen todisteen siitä että olet tilin omistaja. Oheisella lomakkeella voit tehdä todisteen.
login.lost_password_p1: Lompakkosi on kryptattu selaimessasi ennen kuin se lähetetään meille ja tästä johtuen emme voi palauttaa salasanoja. Välttääksesi mahdollisen rahojen menettämisen unohtuneen salasanan takia, on suositeltavaa että teet paperisen varmuuskopion lompakkosi yksityisavaimista.

transactions.no_transactions: Normaalisti bitcoin-tapahtumasi olisi listattu täällä, mutta et ole vielä tehnyt niitä vielä lainkaan.

send_coins.quick_send_sub: Use the form below to send a payment to a bitcoin address.
send_coins.to_address_tooltip: This is the Bitcoin Address of the recipient.
send_coins.to_address_help: Enter The Bitcoin Address of the Recipient
send_coins.amount_tooltip: The Amount in Bitcoins to Send
send_coins.amount_help: Enter The Amount of Bitcoins to send
send_coins.send_payment_tooltip: Click Here to send payment. You will not be asked to review the transaction.
send_coins.send_via_sms_sub: Use the form below to send bitcoin's via SMS.
send_coins.sms_number_tooltip: Enter the SMS number of the person you want to send bitcoins to.
send_coins.sms_number_help: Enter The SMS Number of the Recipient.
send_coins.send_via_email_sub: Use the form below to send bitcoin's to an email address.
send_coins.email_address_tooltip: This is the email address of the person you wish to send bitcoins to.
send_coins.email_address_help: Enter The Email Address of the Recipient
send_coins.send_shared_sub: Send shared routes transactions through a shared wallet for increased privacy.
send_coins.send_shared_total: Including fees the total of this transaction is {0}
send_coins.send_shared_bonus: There will be no fees for this transaction and a bonus of {0} will be paid.
send_coins.send_shared_free: Shared send is currently free of charge.
send_coins.shared_coin_sub: Trustless coin mixing using coin join and taint analysis
send_coins.shared_coin_help_description: When sending a shared coin transaction a number of intermediate addresses are used. If anything interupts the process or an error prevents the transaction from completing the coins may be left in an intermediate address. Click the button below to claim any coins left in intermediate addresses, this process can take several minutes to complete.
send_coins.review_payment_tooltip: Click Here to review payment. You will be able to confirm or cancel the transaction.
send_coins.shared_transaction_fees: All shared transactions incur a {0}% Fee.
send_coins.custom_transaction_sub: Use the form below to send a payment to one or more bitcoin addresses. You will be asked review your transaction before submission.
send_coins.from_address_tooltip: If required you can choose to send coins from a specific address in your wallet.
send_coins.add_recipient_tooltip: If you want to send bitcoins to multiple recipients at once click here to add another address
send_coins.miners_fee_tooltip: This fee will be sent to the bitcoin miners and can help your transaction be processed faster
send_coins.change_address_tooltip: Any Change From The Transaction will be sent back to this address
send_coins.public_note_tooltip: Add a note to this transaction which will be viewable on blockchain.info.
send_coins.public_note_placeholder: This message will be permanently embedded in the blockchain. Anyone can read it.
send_coins.satoshi_dice_sub: {0} is the most popular bitcoin betting game. Win up to 64,000x your bet, instantly. All rolls are verifiable using the blockchain.
send_coins.btcdice_sub: {0} - Choose the odds, place a bet and receive your winnings back in seconds.
send_coins.send_via_facebook_sub: Use the form below to send bitcoin's to a facebook friend.
send_coins.facebook_help: Enter The Name of the facebook recipient
send_coins.address_book_sub: The address book contains a list of sending addresses. You can use it to store the bitcoin addresses of people you know or merchants you use frequently.
send_coins.repetitions_help: A higher number of repetitions makes the transaction more difficult to trace and improves privacy.

import_export.advanced_warning_sub: This section allows you to make changes to your wallet which can be complicated and confusing. It is recommended only experienced Bitcoin Users proceed from here. You should have an understanding of what private keys are and how they relate to bitcoin addresses.
import_export.import_backup_sub: A list of wallet backups available from our cloud storage server.
import_export.watch_only_p1: You may add a {0} bitcoin address to your wallet. You will not be able to send bitcoins from this address without later providing the private key
import_export.import_private_key_p1: Import an existing private key below. All private key formats are supported.
import_export.brain_wallet_p1: A Brain Wallet is a private key seeded from a memorable pass-phrase. It is possible to memorize this password in order to restore the funds at this address without needing a wallet backup.
import_export.brain_wallet_p2: The minimum pass-phrase length is 15 characters. It is highly recommended you still keep regular wallet backups even with the pass-phrase memorized.
import_export.import_paper_p1: Use your Webcam to scan a QR code from a paper wallet
import_export.import_wallet_p1: You may import keys in several different formats.

import_wallet_formats.aes: AES encrypted backup from blockchain.info. (Must be encrypted with the same password)

import_export.import_keys_limit: Please be aware there is currently a limit of 400 private keys per wallet. For large wallets your browser may become unresponsive for a few minutes.
import_export.import_textarea_placeholder: Copy And Paste your wallet data into this area
import_export.export_p1: Below are your private keys AES encrypted.
import_export.export_unencrypted_p1: Below are your private keys in JSON format. Warning! This data is unencrypted keep it safe.
import_export.desktop_sync_p1: This tool enables you to sync your wallet with the official desktop client available from bitcoin.org.
import_export.desktop_sync_instructions: Please install the {0} available for Google Chrome.
import_export.installed_refresh_page: Once installed please refresh this page.
import_export.desktop_sync_step2_p1: In order for your browser to talk to your desktop client your must enable the bitcoin RPC server in the bitcoin.conf file. If the file does not exist you must create it. For Example:
import_export.desktop_sync_change_password: Change username and password to one of your own choice.
import_export.desktop_sync_step2_further_instructions: Once your have modified the file restart the Bitcoin application. For more information on enable the bitcoin RPC interface consult the {0}

rpc.label: Label
rpc.password_help: If your Bitcoin-Qt Wallet is encrypted enter the password here.

modals.second_password_p1: This action requires that you enter your second password which is needed fully decrypt your wallet. You should never enter your second password on an untrusted computer. Use the onscreen keyboard to provide some protection from keyloggers.
modals.main_password_p1: This action requires you re-enter your main password. Please enter it carefully or you may be be logged out.
modals.label_address_p1: Please enter a label for address {0}
modals.label: Label:
modals.label_help: A label is used to help you remember what this address is for. It can be the name of a person or company.
modals.label_make_public_help: By Default address labels are visible to you only. Public labels are publically visible on the blockchain website and can be viewed by anyone.
modals.sign_message_sub: Use this tool to sign a message which proves that you own an address. Only Sign Detailed Messages you fully agree with, never sign vague messages. Pressing Sign Message may cause your browser to become unresponsive for a few seconds.
modals.message_placeholder: Enter the Message You Wish To Sign
modals.verify_message_p1: Use this tool verify a message signed by the owner of a particular bitcoin address
modals.verify_result:
This message was signed by address {0}.
Does this match the address you were expecting?
modals.add_address_book_entry_placeholder: Enter the Bitcoin Address you wish to add to your address book.
modals.address_book_label_help: Enter the Label for this address. e.g. the name of the person or company name.
modals.address_not_synced_p1: You are receiving this warning because your wallet contains an address which has not been saved to our servers yet.
modals.address_not_synced_p2: Unless the private key is saved elsewhere any coins sent to un-synced addresses will be permanently lost after logout
modals.address_not_synced_p1: A newly generated address has not been saved on our servers yet.
modals.watch_only_warning_p1: You are receiving this warning because you have copied a {0} address to the clipboard.
modals.watch_only_warning_p2: A {0} address means you can only observe the transactions at this address. Unless you have the private key saved elsewhere then you do not own the funds at this address.
modals.watch_only_warning_p3: If you do not have a paper wallet or other backup you should not withdraw coins to this address or instruct anyone to send you coins at this address
modals.add_watch_only_address_p1: Please Confirm you would to add the {0} address {1}.
modals.add_watch_only_address_p3: If you are not clear on the difference between a bitcoin address and a private key then this is probably not the option you want.
modals.confirm_delete_warning: Deleting an incorrect address will cause financial loss. If you are not sure what you are doing press cancel now
modals.confirm_delete_p1: Are you sure would like to remove the address? You will no longer be able to send or receive bitcoins from this address. The balance of this address is:
modals.confirm_delete_countdown: You have {0} seconds to change your mind...
modals.sweep_keys_p1: Sweep means to move all available funds in one or more addresses to another address. Please choose an address where you would like to sweep the selected addresses (Balance {0}).
modals.ask_for_shared_p1: Send this transaction through the shared wallet and get a{0}% bonus ({1} will be sent back to the sending address). The transaction will incur a delay of approximately {2}.
modals.ask_for_shared_warning: Do not accept if you expect to receive payment back to the sending address. Shared transactions are incompatible with SatoshiDICE, BitLotto and many other bitcoin games.
modals.insufficient_funds_p1: This transaction cannot be sent because there are insufficent funds available. This may be due to additional miners fees or unconfirmed transactions.
modals.insufficient_funds_p2: The transaction can either be cancelled. Or the amount to send can be adjusted to match the maximum amount available to send.
modals.miners_fee_recommended_p1: This transaction is low priority. It is recommended you include at least a 0.0001 BTC transaction fee in order to ensure miners process it.
modals.miners_fee_recommended_warning: If you do not include a fee this transaction may take a long time to get confirmed. Any funds will be returned to you in approximately 24 hours.
modals.higher_fee_recommended_p1: You specified a custom fee of {0} however the recommended fee for this transaction is {0}. Would you like to use the recommended fee instead?
modals.password_change_p1: Your password will be updated immediately. Be sure to make a note of the new password as it cannot be recovered if forgotten! If you have any encrypted wallet backups it will be possible to decrypt them using your old password, it is recommended you remove any of these backups.
modals.created_offline_p1: Your transaction has been created successfully but has not yet been broadcast to the p2p network.
modals.offline_instructions: To complete the transaction open {0}. Copy and paste the text below into the textarea and press submit to complete the transaction.
modals.signing_please_wait: Please Wait. Signing Input Number {0} out of {1}...
modals.please_confirm: Please confirm you would like to {0}
modals.compressed_private_key_p1: Compressed private keys are currently not supported using the Android app, iPhone app or Merchant API. If you import a compressed private key directly you will not be able to spend the funds at that address using the previously listed devices.
modals.compressed_private_key_p2: The recommended solution is to sweep the funds into a existing bitcoin address. Would you like to sweep this private key instead?
modals.send_via_email_sub: The following message will be sent to the recipient.
modals.claim_p1: Please choose one of the options below to claim your bitcoins. Until claimed the sender is able to reverse this payment.
modals.claim_zero_balance: The balance of this bitcoin address is zero. The payment may have already been claimed or the transaction was reversed by the sender.
modals.claim_to_desktop: Enter the bitcoin address of your desktop client:
modals.private_key_needed_p1: This action requires the private key of bitcoin address {0}. Please enter the private key below.
modals.wallet_password_p1: If this wallet is encrypted please enter the password below. Otherwise leave it blank.
modals.wallet_second_password_p1: Please enter the second password for this wallet.
modals.encrypted_private_key_modal_password_des: An encrypted private key has been detected. Please enter the encryption passphrase below:
modals.import_private_key_warning_p1: Never import a private key from a public or untrusted source. This includes common brain wallets, competitions and purchased private keys. Instead we recommend to sweep the key, which means to send all the funds to one of your existing addresses rather than actually adding a new address to your wallet.
modals.shared_coin_in_progress_modal: Transaction in progress. Do not close this window or exit your browser.
modals.shared_coin_transaction_error: An error occurred completing this shared coin transaction. For further information please check the javascript console.

errors.payload_null: Serious Error! Payload seems to be Null

errors.two_factor_enabled_no_email: Two factor Authentication is enabled but you have not added an email.

errors.alias_too_long: Alias can be a macimum of 25 characters

api_index.title: Bitcoin Developer API's - Blockchain.info
api_index.meta_description: Blockchain provides free API's for bitcoin merchants and developers.
api_index.sub_header: Tools for developers to get data about the blockchain
api_index.abuse_notice: Services provided by blockchain.info are free of charge. Please do not abuse them.
api_index.bitpay_description: Blockchain highly recommends Bitpay - The World Leader in Bitcoin Business Solutions. Bitpay offers a complete checkout solution for including automatic conversion to local currencies and integration with a host of shopping cart software.
api_index.welcome_p1: Here you will find everything you need to get started coding for bitcoin. You can use Blockchain.info's own API's or
api_index.receive_payments_description: An incredibly easy method for websites to receive bitcoin payments.
api_index.blockchain_wallet_api_description: API to send and receive payment from a Blockchain Wallet Account
api_index.send_description: Simple JSON api use to programmatically send and receive bitcoins from a My Wallet Account.
api_index.json_rpc_description: Blockchain.info is able to function as a bitcoind RPC server for merchants to interact with their My Wallet Account.
api_index.create_wallet_description: Programmatically create wallets for your users with the ability to load and redeem funds.
api_index.up_time_description: Blockchain.info use a high availability database cluster and dedicated hardware for maximum up time and low response times.
api_index.data_api_description: Query json data on blocks and transactions. Almost all the data you see on this website is available in JSON format.
api_index.simple_query_api_description: Simple plain text API for querying blockchain data. Compatible with
api_index.websocket_description: Low latency streaming socket channel providing data on new blocks and transactions. Subscribe to notification on blocks, transactions or an address and receive JSON objects describing a transaction or block when an event occurs.
api_index.exchange_rates_data: Currency data from the major bitcoin exchanges.
api_index.charts_and_statistics_description: JSON feed containing the data from the charts and stats pages.
api_index.request_limits_p1: For an API Code to bypass the request limiter please

ip_log.title: Bitcoin-solmujen loki
ip_log.meta_description: Lista kaikista IP-osoitteista, jotka ovat yhdistäneet bitcoin-verkkoon.
ip_log.sub_header: Lista kaikista bitcoin-solmuista, joihin blockchain.info on yhdistänyt viime aikoina.

relayed_by.title: Ips Associated With Address
relayed_by.warning: These IP addresses were the first were the first to relay a transaction involving the selected address. It does not necessarily mean they are the transaction's owner.

about_us.title: Tietoja meistä - Blockchain.info
about_us.sub_header: Keitä me olemme ja mitä me teemme
about_us.about_p1: Blockchain.info on bitcoinin käyttäjien keskuudessa suosituin bitcoin-lompakko ja blokkiselain. Tammikuussa 2014 sivulla oli yli 1,1 miljoonaa rekisteröitynyttä käyttäjää ja 200 miljoonaa sivujen katsomista kuukaudessa.
about_us.security_p1: Turvallisuuspolitiikkamme perustuu siihen, että säilytämme niin vähän tietoa kuin mahdollista, jolloin mahdollisen hyökkäksen sattuessa tietoa menetetään mahdollisimman vähän. Käyttämälle lompakko-palveluamme, lompakkosi ja kaikki henkilökohtaiset tietosi säilytetään kryptatussa muodossa Blockchain.infon yksityisesti omistamilla laitteilla, joita ainoastaan sivuston omistajat voivat hallita. Suoritamme säännöllisiä tietoturvakatsauksia sekä palvelumme lähdekoodiin että servereillemme sisältäen sivustomme skannaamisen nmap-ohjelmalle tunnistaaksemme mahdolliset porsaanreiät ajoissa. Sivustolla on myös GoDaddyn myöntämä SSL-sertifikaatti.
about_us.availability_p1: Pyrimme 99.5 % päälläoloaikaan. Jos olemme suunnitelleet huollon, ilmoitamme siitä käyttäjillemme sähköpostitse.
about_us.name: Name:

double_spends.title: Bitcoin Double Spends - Blockchain.info
double_spends.sub_header: Double spends detected in the last 500,000 transactions (10 Minute Cache)
double_spends.warning: Double spends on this page may be unintentional. In the event that a double spend is maliciously crafted being listed on this page is no indication that it was successful or any merchant or user lost money as a result.

webgl_globe.title: Bitcoin Nodes Web GL Globe - Blockchain.info

propagation.title: Bitcoin Network Propagation - Blockchain.info
propagation.sub_header: Shows the distribution of a transaction or block throughout the network
propagation.node_list_sub: All nodes that have relayed this inventory item

ip_info.title: Transactions Relayed By {0} - Blockchain.info
ip_info.meta_description: Bitcoin Transactions relayed by ip address {0}
ip_info.sub_header: Transactions that were relayed first by the ip {0}

largest_transactions.title: Largest Bitcoin Transactions - Blockchain.info
largest_transactions.meta_description: A list of the largest recent bitcoin transactions

orphaned_blocks.title: Orphaned Blocks - Blockchain.info
orphaned_blocks.meta_description: Orphaned blocks are valid blocks not part of the main bitcoin block chain.
orphaned_blocks.p1: Detached or Orphaned blocks are valid blocks which are not part of the main chain. They can occur naturally when two miners produce blocks at similar times or they can be caused by an attacker (with enough hashing power) attempting to reverse transactions.

payment_request.title: Payment Request {0}
payment_request.please_send: Please send payment to bitcoin address
payment_request.p1: Use this form to request someone sends you bitcoins or simply to show people you have a bitcoin address.

donation_button.title: Create Donation Button
donation_button.p1: Insert the following code into the head section of the page.
donation_button.p2: Insert the following html code at the position where you would like the button to appear

pools.title: Bitcoin Hashrate Distribution - Blockchain.info
pools.meta_description: A pie chart showing the hashrate distribution between the major bitcoin mining pools
pools.sub_header: An estimation of hashrate distribution amongst the largest mining pools
pools.p1: The graph below shows the market share of the most popular bitcoin mining pools. It should only be used as a rough estimate and for various reasons will not be 100% accurate.
pools.warning: A large portion of Unknown blocks does not mean an attack on the network, it simply means we have been unable to determine the origin.

popular_addresses.title: 100 Most Popular Bitcoin Addresses - Blockchain.info
popular_addresses.meta_description: A list of the top 100 most popular bitcoin addresses by number of outputs.
popular_addresses.sub_header: Most popular bitcoin addresses by number of outputs

push_tx.title: Broadcast Transaction - Blockchain.info
push_tx.p1: This page allows you to paste a raw transaction in hex format (i.e. characters 0-9, a-f) and broadcast is over the bitcoin network.
push_tx.check_tx_warning: Tip: Check your transaction before broadcasting using the {0}decode transaction tool{1}

decode_tx.title: Decode Bitcoin Transaction - Blockchain.info
decode_tx.p1: This page will decode a raw transaction in hex format (i.e. characters 0-9, a-f) and display it in human readable format

rejected.title: Rejected Transactions & Blocks - Blockchain.info
rejected.sub_header: Transactions and blocks which have been rejected by our bitcoin nodes.

startup_message.title: Site Loading - Blockchain.info
startup_message.p1: Should be back in a few seconds. There might even be new features.

strange_transactions.title: Strange Transactions - Blockchain.info
strange_transactions.meta_description: A list of bitcoin with non-standard outputs
strange_transactions.sub_header: Transactions containing outputs from which we were unable to decode a bitcoin address.

hub_nodes.title: Bitcoin Hub Nodes - Blockchain.info
hub_nodes.meta_description: IP addresses of bitcoin nodes which relay the most transactions to blockchain.info
hub_nodes.sub_header: Shows the nodes who have relayed the most transactions first to blockchain.info. The nodes on this page are well connected often hub nodes for merchants or miners.

tx_tree.title: Visualise Transaction {0} - Blockchain.info
tx_tree.meta_description: A tree graph showing the outputs of bitcoin transaction {0}
tx_tree.output_spent: Output is spent - Click to load its children.
tx_tree.output_unspent: Output is unspent and has no children.

emails.tip_backup: Backup your bitcoin wallet using dropbox. It's free, easy to use and secure.
emails.tip_reversible: This payment can be reversed by the sender until claimed.

account_locked.p1: A number of failed attempts have been made to login to to your My Wallet account. For your protection the new login attempts have been disabled until {0}
account_locked.p2: If these login attempts were not made by you it is recommended you change your password as soon as the account is available again. If you are particularly concerned please contact us and we will extend the lock.

confirmation_code.p1: An attempt has been made to login to your My wallet account from ip address {0}. Enter the confirmation code below to access your account. If it was not you who made this login attempt you can ignore this email.

authorize_login.title: Authorize log-in attempt
authorize_login.p1: An attempt to login to your blockchain.info wallet was made from an unknown browser. Please confirm the following details are correct:
authorize_login.p2: If the above details are correct click the following link to approve the request:
authorize_login.p3: If this login attempt was not made by you this email can be safely ignored. It means someone visited your wallet login page using your alias from an unrecognized browser. The login attempt was blocked, it does not mean your wallet or password is compromised, but if the request was not made by you we recommend you change your wallet alias.

login_blocked.title: Login attempt blocked
login_blocked.p1: An attempt to access your My Wallet account has been blocked. For your own security please review the details below:
login_blocked.p2: If this login attempt was made by you this email can be safely ignored. However if this login attempt was not made by you somebody may be trying to access your wallet, in this case access was blocked.

wallet_backup.p1: Attached to this email is an AES encrypted wallet backup which contains everything you need to restore your bitcoin balance. You can use it to restore the wallet at anytime at {0} or using the 3rd party {1} Desktop client.

two_factor_reset_request.p1: A request has been made to remove two-factor authentication from your My Wallet account:
two_factor_reset_request.p2: If this request was made by you please open the following URL to approve this request:
two_factor_reset_request.p3: If this request was not made by you please open the following URL to decline this request:
two_factor_reset_request.p4: It is possible someone may be trying to maliciously access to your bitcoin wallet. Please do not ignore this request.

password_hints.p1: You are receiving this email because a request was made to view your wallet password hints.

tx.sent_p1: A Payment has been sent from your bitcoin wallet.
tx.received_p1: A Payment has been received into your bitcoin wallet.

tx_removed.title: Bitcoin Transaction Failed
tx_removed.p1: A transaction made through Blockchain.info has been removed from our database because it was taking a long time to be included in a block.
tx_removed.p2: Any funds have been returned to your wallet and you can now spend the coins again. Please consider including a larger fee in future transactions.

welcome.p1: This email contains important information about your new bitcoin wallet. Be sure to keep this safe and stored separately from your password.

deposit.order_success: Order successfully completed your coins should be on the way shortly. If you do not receive your order or have any other questions please contact us.
deposit.order_error: Error processing payment or User cancelled you have not been charged. You may now close this dialog.
deposit.order_paid: Thank you for confirming that payment has been sent. Payments usually clear within 1 minute to 4 hours a confirmation sms message will be sent on completion. If you do not receive your order or have any other questions please contact us.
deposit.deposit_processed: Your deposit of {0} has been processed. Thank You {1}
deposit.name: Full Name
deposit.uk_bank_p1: Please enter the details of the account holder
deposit.shared_help: The bitcoins will be sent through a shared wallet for improved privacy (0.5% Fee).
deposit.amount_help: Enter the amount to purchase in {0}.
deposit.please_verify: In order to use our {0} deposit service please verify your Mobile Phone number.
deposit.pingit_p1: If you do not have a PingIt account yet, setup is easy and the app can be downloaded from the app store on your smart phone.
deposit.pingit_instructions_1: To complete this order please send payment of {0} to {1} using reference {2}. Check the reference number carefully.
deposit.sofort_instructions: Payment will be made using an instant online bank transfer.
deposit.sms_p1: Once verified the actual purchase can be made from a different phone number or landline phone.

tx_confirmation_warnings.small_output_no_fee: This transaction has an output less than 0.01 BTC but doesn't include a fee.
tx_confirmation_warnings.very_small_output: This transaction has a very small output and is none standard.
tx_confirmation_warnings.zero_output: This transaction has a zero BTC output and is none standard.
tx_confirmation_warnings.fee_less_than_recommended: The transaction fee is less than recommended.
tx_confirmation_warnings.transaction_output_none_standard: This transaction has a none standard output.
tx_confirmation_warnings.transaction_input_none_standard: This transaction has a none standard input.
tx_confirmation_warnings.transaction_non_canonical_push_data: This transaction has a none canonical push data op codes.
tx_confirmation_warnings.transaction_spends_unconfirmed: This transaction spends an input which is unconfirmed.

transactions_summary.transaction_is_double_spend: This Transaction is a Double Spend!

redirect_page.title: You are being redirected to an external site
redirect_page.slow_page: If this page appears for more than a few seconds

translations_page.title: Help Translate Blockchain.info
translations_page.sub_header: Blockchain.info is now available in 16 languages.
translations_page.p1: Blockchain.info is now available in 16 different languages. However the translation has been done primarily by machine, we need your help to provide better translations.
translations_page.p2: If you are familiar with {0} and {1} follow the instructions below:

steps._2: Clone the new fork of the translations project.
steps._3: Download a good JSON editor. We recommend 'Sublime Text 2' available free for Windows, Mac and Linux.
steps._4: Open the files auto_{your_language}.json and {your_language}.json side by side.
steps._5: Any phrases in the auto generated file that do not make sense copy them into the other file and correct the mistakes.
steps._6: The JSON structure must be identical in both files, do not edit any of the key names.
steps._7: When finished commit the changes and submit a {0}.
steps._8: Include your bitcoin address for a bounty or if you prefer change the link on the homepage to your own website.
